game_description: Plumbing Safety is a standalone experience that allows anyone to explore, learn about and test their knowledge of electrical safety for plumbing, with a particular focus on cutting copper pipes. Players are guided through the process of safely cutting a copper pipe using various tools, followed by an unguided assessment section. Feedback is given automatically as the player progresses through the experience.
review_1: Very easy game, friend recommended it to and said “the game is kind of short it’s a only a tutorial and then the same thing with the help” didn’t believe him and downloaded it any way come to find out it was the truth so please add me levels and maybe it will get a higher rating.
review_2: The game is to short.add levels
review_3: It’s a great game but it needs way more levels than just one if you added more this game would easily get 5 stars But over all very good game mechanics and overall gameplay is really good
review_4: Can’t put gas sticker on but with the water one you can so you can’t complete the level
review_5: Can’t get past the first level ￼
